nodes.text: Cael Hanarist was an Alderaanian from House Hanarist. He served on Team Alderaan, the Limmie group and was one of the fastest players in the galaxy. He had a fiancee from another House. In 0 BBY, his homeworld was destroyed, causing him to join the Rebel Alliance as a soldier in Alliance Special Operations. He took part in the takeover at Whisper Base and then defended it from Moff Lasre Dardano's counterattack.
His Team Alderaan jersey hung in an Alderaanian expat cantina in Hanna City, Chandrila.
Cael Hanarist appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
